channel.title: How long
channel.description: Does the watched state hold out? It seems different on these forums unless I was given a very high watched warning. (This is addressed to multiple moderators who can answer my question the quickest without bothering other moderators in work.)

item.title: How long
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“spy man47, post:8, topic:350128”][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=446494.msg3277831#msg3277831 date=1279670534]
Let’s say you are given a 30% warning level, which is the max level you can be for the ‘Watched’ status. For the first 24 hours, the percentage will not decrease. After the next 24 hours, it will drop by 5% for each next 24 hours. So to shorten it, it starts dropping after 48 hours have passed.

5-30% = Watched
35-55% = Moderated
60%-100% = Muted
[/quote]

I rep- you if you don’t mind =P[/quote]

Irrelevant. Oh noes 199. We all die now.

Anyway; The warning system seems like a normal SMF, so that’s all I really needed to know.

Read full topic

item.title: How long
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:2, topic:350128”][quote author=SilentCJ link=action=profile;u=259364 date=1279318509]
…it goes down by 3 percent everyday, and it’s got to get below 30% for you to not be moderated…
[/quote][/quote]

This.

And you’re currently on 35% warning level so it should be gone so you can post normally in 2 days.
edit: actually, I think it could be 5% each day , so you might be alright tomorrow.

Read full topic
